long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds buttons to book lessons directly from the ASVZ Sportfahrplan page. If you think you should have access please get in touch using the "Contact the developer" button.

NOTE: The 'username' and 'password' of your AAI account are NOT accessed; the extension only has access to websites under "asvz.ch" and cannot access anything at "switch.ch" (see Permissions when installing).
